tasks.title: Create Web UI for Task Management
tasks.description: Implement a web-based visualization interface for the task management system
tasks.details: Build a user-friendly web interface to manage tasks and subtasks with the ability to expand/collapse task details.
tasks.testStrategy: Manually test the interface to ensure all functionality works as expected.

subtasks.title: Implement Server Component
subtasks.description: Create Express server to serve the web UI
subtasks.details: Implement a simple Express server that serves static files and provides API endpoints for task data.

subtasks.title: Create Frontend HTML/CSS
subtasks.description: Design and implement the frontend UI
subtasks.details: Create responsive HTML and CSS for the task management interface with appropriate styling.

subtasks.title: Implement Client-side JavaScript
subtasks.description: Add interactive functionality to the UI
subtasks.details: Implement client-side JavaScript to handle task operations, expand/collapse, and data fetching from the API.

tasks.title: Add Task Status Updates
tasks.description: Allow updating task status from the web UI
tasks.details: Add the ability to update task status (pending, done, deferred) from the web interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Test status updates on various tasks and verify the changes persist.

tasks.title: Implement Task Filtering
tasks.description: Add ability to filter tasks by status
tasks.details: Implement filtering functionality to show tasks based on their status.
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering with various status values and verify correct tasks are shown.
